lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa wrapped up the L.P.G.A. Tour’s player of the year award with a record-setting finish in the Tournament of Champions in Mobile, Ala. Ochoa, a 24-year-old from Mexico, shot a seven-under 65 for a 10-stroke victory and a tournament-record 21-under 267 total. She ran her winning streak to three with her sixth victory of the year. She won the player of the year award for the first time, ending Annika Sorenstam’s five-year reign.
